intro: Sterculia apeibophylla, commonly known as the broad-leaf sterculia, is a tropical tree native to parts of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton plants. The plant is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves and showy, pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters.
